properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Weak and wounded sinner Lost and left to die O, raise your head, for love is passing by Come to Jesus Come to Jesus Come to Jesus and live!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now your burden’s lifted And carried far away And precious blood has washed away the stain, so Sing to Jesus Sing to Jesus Sing to Jesus and live!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And like a newborn baby Don’t be afraid to crawl And remember when you walk Sometimes we fall…so Fall on Jesus Fall on Jesus Fall on Jesus and live!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sometimes the way is lonely And steep and filled with pain So if your sky is dark and pours the rain, then Cry to Jesus Cry to Jesus Cry to Jesus and live!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O, and when the love spills over And music fills the night And when you can’t contain your joy inside, then Dance for Jesus Dance for Jesus Dance for Jesus and live!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And with your final heartbeat Kiss the world goodbye Then go in peace, and laugh on Glory’s side, and Fly to Jesus Fly to Jesus Fly to Jesus and live!{/lang-eng}
